ruleMB_SR0001.message: JSON structure is invalid against schema.

ruleMB_SR0030.name: Invalid characters
ruleMB_SR0030.message: Invalid characters detected. Please check for non-standard characters in your field values around [### Invalid character ###] and reformat as ASCII-only so that data can be properly consumed by dependent databases.
